level.heading: Legislative declaration.
level.text: * ยง 20-410 Legislative declaration. It is hereby declared that the business of servicing electronic or home appliances has become the subject of great abuse. The public has been and is unprotected from unethical and financially unstable service dealers. The necessity for legislative intervention to protect the public and legitimate service dealers is hereby declared as a matter of legislative determination. * NB There are 2 ยง 20-410's
